pages.title: Magic essence crystals
pages.text: these are crystals of magic that has a magic element inside it. these are obtained by killing mobs
some essence crystals can be crafted into useable forms. a example of this is fire essence. it can be crafted into a burnable that can be placed as a fuel source for furnaces,and blast furnaces
fire crystals are occasionally dropped by blazes
lightning crystals are occasionally dropped by creepers
life crystals are occasionally dropped by zombies
earth crystals are occasionally dropped by skeletons

pages.title: Magic Elemental Staves
pages.text: these are staves made from combining magiwood and the corresponding elemental crystals. do not drop these staves as the crystal will shatter and activate all of its uses at once
this allows the user to summon blocks and can even throw a porjectile that summons blocks. drop effect:sufficate the user by summoning a mound of blocks at the user's location
this allows the user to light fires if close or shoot a fireball if far away. drop effect: summon a dragon fire charge at the user's location

this allows the user to bonemeal crops if close. if far away it throws a projectile. if it hits a mob it heals it and if it hits a block it summons a random natural object. drop effect: the only safe staff to drop
right click summon lightning(that simple) drop effect:summon lighting
